titleStmt.title: Milke for babes The English catechisme, set downe in the Common-Prayer Booke, breifly explaned for the private vse of the younger and more vnlearned sort of his parishioners of Apleton, in the county of Berks: By W.D.
titleStmt.author: Dickinson, William, b. 1584 or 5.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield, printer to the famous Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
